slide.title: Xdebug: Tracing
slide.blurb: Xdebug is capable of generating a trace of the entire script, allowing you to easily see the flow of the code. The traces can be printed to screen or logged to a file for future analysis.
The tracing can be started manually via %xdebug_start_trace()% or automatically through the %xdebug.auto_trace% option.
